title: saccidAnanda svarUpanE
sahitya:
saccidAnanda svarUpanE sadAshivanE


anupallavi

  iccA jnAna kriyA shakti Ishvari samEtanAga muccakamum 
paDaittuk-kAttu muDittut-tOTrum mUlap-poruLE


caraNam    shuddha manattir-shollittiDum param jyOti veLLamE 
bhakti koNDa uLLam tannirp-pADum vaLLalE
shakti analait-tUNDi Aru cakkarangaLait-tANDi
mukti nilaiyAm sahasrArattil nittiya shuddha
sutantara sattiya siddhi aLittaruL
